pullRequest.title: EQL: Extract query folder tests definitions into resources
pullRequest.bodyText:
@costin, this addresses the other ask that you had for extracting the tests specs into resources.
As far as I understood we were talking about simple text file, but can change the format however needed. Let me know.

beforeCommit.message: EQL: Extract query folder tests definitions into resources

afterCommit.message: EQL: Extract query folder tests definitions into resources

nodes.bodyText: These unclosed parentheses are tearing holes in my OCD soul. 😄
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,66 @@
+//
+// QueryFolder test
+// Simple format of the following blocks, separated by two new lines
+// <name>
+// <eql query>
+// <expectation 1>
+// <expectation 2>
+// ...
+// <expectation n>
+
+
+basic
+process where true
+null
+
+
+singleNumericFilterEquals
+process where serial_event_id = 1
+"term":{"serial_event_id":{"value":1

nodes.bodyText: This test was skipped during externalization. Discovered that during backporting - I'm working on fixing it in master and 7.x
